languages.text: "Если почувствуешь, что дух твой ослаб, приди ко мне с исповедью, и благодать осуждения изгонит порок из сердца твоего".
"If you ever feel your spirit weakening, come to me and confess, and the virtue of castigation will purge the flaws from your heart."
languages.original_text: "Если почувствуешь, что дух твой ослаб, приди ко мне с исповедью, и благодать осуждения изгонит порок из сердца твоего".

traits.locale_text: "If you ever feel your spirit weakening, come to me and confess, and the virtue of castigation will purge the flaws from your heart."
"If you ever feel your spirit weakening, come to me and confess, and the virtue of castigation will purge the flaws from your heart."
"If you ever feel your spirit weakening, come to me and confess, and the virtue of castigation will purge the flaws from your heart."
"If you ever feel your spirit weakening, come to me and confess, and the virtue of castigation will purge the flaws from your heart."
"If you ever feel your spirit weakening, come to me and confess, and the virtue of castigation will purge the flaws from your heart."

languages.text: “如果你觉得信念发生了动摇，就来找我忏悔吧。惩罚的美德会净化你内心的瑕疵。”
languages.original_text: "If you ever feel your spirit weakening, come to me and confess, and the virtue of castigation will purge the flaws from your heart."

traits.locale_text: “如果你觉得信念发生了动摇，就来找我忏悔吧。惩罚的美德会净化你内心的瑕疵。”

languages.text: 「もし心が弱くなったと感じたら、俺のところへ来て懺悔するといい。懲罰の美徳がお前の心から綻びを消してくれる」
languages.original_text: "If you ever feel your spirit weakening, come to me and confess, and the virtue of castigation will purge the flaws from your heart."

traits.locale_text: 「もし心が弱くなったと感じたら、俺のところへ来て懺悔するといい。懲罰の美徳がお前の心から綻びを消してくれる」

languages.text: « Si jamais vous sentez que votre esprit s'affaiblit, venez vous confesser et la vertu de l'admonestation purgera votre cœur de ses défauts. »
languages.original_text: "If you ever feel your spirit weakening, come to me and confess, and the virtue of castigation will purge the flaws from your heart."

traits.locale_text: « Si jamais vous sentez que votre esprit s'affaiblit, venez vous confesser et la vertu de l'admonestation purgera votre cœur de ses défauts. »

languages.text: «Si alguna vez se siente débil de espíritu, venga junto a mí y confiese, así el honor del castigo purgará las imperfecciones de su corazón».
languages.original_text: "If you ever feel your spirit weakening, come to me and confess, and the virtue of castigation will purge the flaws from your heart."

traits.locale_text: «Si alguna vez se siente débil de espíritu, venga junto a mí y confiese, así el honor del castigo purgará las imperfecciones de su corazón».

languages.text: "Sollte Euer Geist jemals Schwäche verspüren, kommt zu mir und beichtet, auf dass die Tugend der Geißelung Euer Herz von allen Makeln befreit."
languages.original_text: "If you ever feel your spirit weakening, come to me and confess, and the virtue of castigation will purge the flaws from your heart."

traits.locale_text: "Sollte Euer Geist jemals Schwäche verspüren, kommt zu mir und beichtet, auf dass die Tugend der Geißelung Euer Herz von allen Makeln befreit."
